short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a dose of cuteness to your new tab with the Hello Kitty Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension brings Hello Kitty's adorable charm to your browsing experience, creating a joyful and playful atmosphere. With quick access to your favorite websites, custom shortcuts, and a built-in calendar and clock, it’s a fun and practical addition to your browser. Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Delight in Hello Kitty’s cheerful and cute design.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Easily visit your most frequently accessed websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with links you use the most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Seamlessly search the web using your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall quickly via the provided links.
